ModMetaData.name: RJW Genes
ModMetaData.author: Vegapnk - 1.6 Rewrite by Telanda
ModMetaData.description: Adds Genes for RJW Content. Adds: - Genes for Genitalia Types and Sizes - Fertilin, a resource similiar to Hemogen, and accompanying sex-vampires - Mechanics for Breeding and being Breed by Animals and Insects - Inherit genes from bestiality or produce VGE-Hybrids - Male / Female Only, MPreg, Genderfluid Pawns - Orgasmic Mytosis, Orgasmic Supercharging, Age-Transfer on Sex, Pheromones - Cum-Amount changes, Cumflation Immunity - Horny Pheromones, Animal Mating Call - Genetic Diseases that Spread on Intercourse - Patches for some popular Xenotypes from the Workshop - Sexual Taming of Animals
